objectClass.name: HLAreflection
objectClass.semantics: This object class is the root class of all ROM object classes.

attribute.name: reflectionName
attribute.semantics: The name of the reflection object.

attribute.name: parents
attribute.semantics: The parents of the object class.

attribute.name: sharing
attribute.semantics: The types of sharing permitted on the object.

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.semantics: The handles of the object attributes.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The object semantics.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: Attribute data type.

attribute.name: updateType
attribute.semantics: Attribute update type.

attribute.name: updateCondition
attribute.semantics: Attribute update condition.

attribute.name: ownership
attribute.semantics: Attribute ownership.

attribute.name: sharing
attribute.semantics: Attribute sharing.

attribute.name: dimensions
attribute.semantics: Attribute dimensions.

attribute.name: transportation
attribute.semantics: Attribute transportation.

attribute.name: order
attribute.semantics: Attribute order.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: Attribute semantics.

attribute.name: parents
attribute.semantics: The parents of the interaction class.

attribute.name: sharing
attribute.semantics: The types of sharing permitted on the interaction.

attribute.name: dimensions
attribute.semantics: The dimensions of the interaction.

attribute.name: transportation
attribute.semantics: The transportation of the interaction.

attribute.name: order
attribute.semantics: The order of the interaction.

attribute.name: parameters
attribute.semantics: The handles of the interaction parameters.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the interaction.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: Parameter data type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: Parameter semantics.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: The data type of the dimension.

attribute.name: upperBound
attribute.semantics: The upper bound of the dimension.

attribute.name: normalization
attribute.semantics: The normalization of the dimension.

attribute.name: value
attribute.semantics: The value of the dimension.

attribute.name: label
attribute.semantics: The label of the synchronization.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: The data type of the synchronization.

attribute.name: capability
attribute.semantics: The capability of the synchronization.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the synchronization.

attribute.name: description
attribute.semantics: The description of the transportation.

attribute.name: size
attribute.semantics: The size of the basic representation.

attribute.name: endian
attribute.semantics: The byte ordering of the basic representation.

attribute.name: interpretation
attribute.semantics: The interpretation of the basic representation.

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.semantics: The encoding of the basic representation.

objectClass.name: HLAsimpleDataType
objectClass.semantics: Represents an HLA simple data type.

attribute.name: representation
attribute.semantics: The representation of the simple type.

attribute.name: units
attribute.semantics: The units of the simple type.

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.semantics: The resolution of the simple type.

attribute.name: accuracy
attribute.semantics: The accuracy of the simple type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the simple type.

objectClass.name: HLAenumeratedDataType
objectClass.semantics: Represents an HLA enumerated data type.

attribute.name: representation
attribute.semantics: The representation of the enumerated type.

attribute.name: enumerators
attribute.semantics: The enumerators of the enumerated type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the enumerated type.

objectClass.name: HLAarrayDataType
objectClass.semantics: Represents an HLA array data type.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: The element type of the array type.

attribute.name: cardinality
attribute.semantics: The cardinality of the array type.

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.semantics: The encoding of the array type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the array type.

objectClass.name: HLAfixedRecordDataType
objectClass.semantics: Represents an HLA fixed record data type.

attribute.name: fields
attribute.semantics: The fields of the fixed record type.

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.semantics: The encoding of the fixed record type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the fixed record type.

objectClass.name: HLAvariantRecordDataType
objectClass.semantics: Represents an HLA variant record data type.

attribute.name: discriminant
attribute.semantics: The discriminant of the variant record type.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.semantics: The data type of the variant record type.

attribute.name: alternatives
attribute.semantics: The alternatives of the variant record type.

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.semantics: The encoding of the variant record type.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.semantics: The semantics of the variant record type.

interactionClass.name: HLAmergeFDD
interactionClass.semantics: Merges the contents of a new federation description document into the FOM.

transportation.name: HLAreliable
transportation.description: Provide reliable delivery of data in the sense that TCP/IP delivers its data reliably.

transportation.name: HLAbestEffort
transportation.description: Make an effort to deliver data in the sense that UDP provides best-effort delivery.

basicData.name: HLAinteger16BE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985.

basicData.name: HLAfloat64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985.

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairBE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAinteger16LE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAfloat64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairLE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAoctet
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

simpleData.name: HLAASCIIchar
simpleData.semantics: Standard ASCII character (see ANSI Std X3.4-1986).

simpleData.name: HLAunicodeChar
simpleData.semantics: Unicode UTF-16 character (see The Unicode Standard, Version 3.0).

enumeratedData.name: HLAendianType
enumeratedData.semantics: Endian type to be used for describing basic representations.

enumeratedData.name: HLAorderType
enumeratedData.semantics: Order type to be used for sending attributes or interactions.

enumeratedData.name: HLAownershipType
enumeratedData.semantics: Ownership type to be used for sending attributes.

enumeratedData.name: HLAsharingType
enumeratedData.semantics: Sharing type to be used for sending attributes or interactions.

enumeratedData.name: HLAupdateType
enumeratedData.semantics: Update type to be used for sending attributes.

enumeratedData.name: HLAcapabilityType
enumeratedData.semantics: Capability type to be used for synchronizations.

arrayData.name: HLAfieldList
arrayData.semantics: List of fixed record type fields.

arrayData.name: HLAalternativeList
arrayData.semantics: List of variant record type alternatives.
